alert.note: Alert for Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 1:27PM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM FRIDAY TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills dropping to between 15 and 24 below zero. Northwest winds gusts between 35 and 50 mph. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Dukes and Nantucket Counties. In Rhode Island, Block Island. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Saturday. Lowest of those wind chills will occur Friday night into mid-morning Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusts between 35 and 50 mph Friday and Friday night. Isolated power outages possible.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
